features.title: Precision Whacking
features.description: Master the art of precise bug elimination with intuitive controls that respond to your every move.

features.title: Satisfying Hits
features.description: Experience thrilling explosions when you successfully whack bugs with perfect timing and accuracy.

features.title: Score System
features.description: Compete for high scores with our dynamic scoring system that rewards quick reflexes and strategic thinking.

features.title: Diverse Bug Types
features.description: Face various insect species, each with unique behaviors and point values that keep the challenge fresh.

features.title: Fast-Paced Action
features.description: Quick reflexes and sharp eyes are your best weapons in this adrenaline-pumping bug-hunting adventure.

features.title: Endless Fun
features.description: Never-ending entertainment with procedurally generated levels and infinite replayability.
